cause.description:
www.FUNDaFIELD.com
FUNDaFIELD is dedicated to enriching the lives of less fortunate youth in Africa through sports. We strive to bring to them, the many hours of enjoyment that we experienced growing up on a soccer field. Our goal is to earn $100,000 for soccer fields and equipment to be provided to African schools. We will FUNDaFIELD and another and another...thank you in advance for your support! Garrett & Kyle Weiss Co-Founders
------------------------------------------
1. Give the game of soccer to children across the globe
2. Keep impoverished African children in school and off the streets
cause.mission: Let the children of Africa enjoy the game of Soccer
cause.name: FUNDaFIELD
